Desc.entry: A community organisation for Kenyan families in Sheffield and surrounding areas. Seeks to enable Kenyan families to network and socialise to promote cultural identity and encourage healthy integration in the wider society. Aims to raise awareness of the negative affects of anti-social behaviour among young people, encourage talent among children and promote a spirit of excellence, support and participate in community initiatives that improve the environment and social welfare, and arranges educational tours to appreciate the geography and history of Britain.
